metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14626 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: PowerDNS Authoritative Server 4.1.0 up to 4.1.4 inclusive and PowerDNS Recursor 4.0.0 up to 4.1.4 inclusive are vulnerable to a packet cache pollution via crafted query that can lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
